author: Special Correspondent
text:
Apart from availing tokens for free bus travel that will be distributed to senior citizens at 42 bus stands and depots across the city, senior citizens can also download forms at www.mtcbus.org.

The applicants should submit proof of age and two passport size photographs with the applications.

The scheme would be implemented from Wednesday. People over sixty can apply for tokens at designated bus stands and depots and

Ten tokens will be issued every month to every senior citizen, an official release said.
title: Free bus pass for senior citizens
